thread.title: Sudan: French Company Attains Mining Block for Gold in Sudan
thread.title_full: Sudan: French Company Attains Mining Block for Gold in Sudan

title: Sudan: French Company Attains Mining Block for Gold in Sudan
text:
Kenya: No More African Presidents for Life 
The French company, meanwhile, expressed full readiness to begin its operations with the block granted to it by the ministry. 
The Company's General Manager Al-Waleed Mohamed Idris revealed, in statements to the press after the end of the signing ceremonies, that their company was one of the largest companies operating in the oil and mineral fields in France, affiliating to the group of "Sejammen", which operates in all the world in the oil sector and its services as well as manufacturing of geological equipment. 
Idris said that their company have a desire to expand in mining sector in Sudan, especially Northern State, revealing that the company endeavours to introduce European technology in the field of minerals in Sudan, to train Sudanese engineers and for Northern State Development and the residents of Al-Burgaig area. Sudan
